participating-org.narrative: The Young Climate Movement ( Jonge Klimaatbeweging) is an organization that represents the interests of young people and representstheir voice in politics, government and society. The Young Climate Movement does this through the lobby document the "Young ClimateAgenda", which is supported by more than 70 diverse youth organizations. The Young Climate Movement unites the voice of various youth organizations. They try to influence climate and sustainability policy by means of campaigns and by entering into discussions with politicians, policymakers and the business community, with the Young Climate Agenda as a guideline. The voice of young people in the climate debate is central to everything they do, think and propagate. Examples of our activities include the Young Climate Agenda, the #ikreisanders campaign and the Climate Dialogues.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood
